text: I think the other thing to not take for granted is being able to integrate and leverage tools in the Julia eco system. Having come from working with Fortran, connecting tools is just _not nearly as simple as it is with Julia_

elements.text: I think the other thing to not take for granted is being able to integrate and leverage tools in the Julia eco system. Having come from working with Fortran, connecting tools is just
not nearly as simple as it is with Julia

text: This is true both for source code as well as depending on code in tests. Sometimes it's nice to depend on 3rd party packages just to test internal implementations.
